attributes.action: Give all NHS workers a 15% pay rise
attributes.background: The NHS has, without a doubt, carried us through the pandemic. It’s wonderful staff have been under unimaginable strain- they put themselves at mental and physical risk every single day. A 1% pay rise is NOT the way to recognise this sacrifice. Claps do not pay the bills.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Please give the NHS Covid Heroes a bigger pay rise.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577970

Recognise all members of NHS nursing profession by giving them a 12.5% pay rise
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560253

Increase pay for all NHS staff by 15%
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/565151
